comment.author: 92284803@N00
comment._content: Should be "Michael Edler von Appel". Here is a source about him. "FML Michael Edler von Appel was given control of the XV. Corps in early October 1911. He replaced GdI Moritz Freiherr von Auffenberg. Appel fulfilled his duties unto his death in January 1915."

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Typo in "Cammdr."  Should presumably be "Commdr" as abbreviation for Commander.

comment.author: 33593953@N02
comment._content: Thanks for catching the typos and providing further information.  We adjust the description when we update.
